sentences.cn: 在咀嚼反刍食物的母牛

sentences.en: I chewed the cud for a couple of days before deciding to refuse your offer.
sentences.cn: 我反复思考了二三天后才决定拒绝你的提议.

sentences.en: I will no longer chew the cud of misfortune that Fate ekes out to us.
sentences.cn: 我将不再反复地思考命运给我们的不幸.

sentences.en: In the old days, many baseball pitchers liked to chew the cud on the mound.
sentences.cn: 从前, 很多棒球手喜欢在踏板上嚼烟块.

sentences.en: She just stood there calmly gazing at me and chewing he cud.
sentences.cn: 它只是站在那儿,静静地望着我,嘴里咀嚼着从胃里吐出的东西.

sentences.en: The cow in the nearby field was still chewing placidly on its cud.
sentences.cn: 附近地里的牛仍在安静地反刍食物。

sentences.en: The horse is chewing the cud.
The old people liked to sit around the stove, chewing the cud of their lost youth.
sentences.cn: 老人们喜欢围坐在火炉边, 漫谈他们已逝的青春时代.

sentences.en: The ruminant , reason, chews a poisoned cud.
sentences.cn: 这反刍动物, 理性, 将毒物嚼尝.

sentences.en: We needed a few more meetings to chew the cud on some tough decisions.
sentences.cn: 我们需要再召开一些会议,深思一些艰难的决定.

sentences.en: You may eat animal that has a split hoof divided in two that chews the cud.
sentences.cn: 凡分蹄成为两瓣、又倒嚼的走兽、你们都可以吃.

trans.tran_en: food that a cow or similar animal has chewed, swallowed, and brought back into its mouth to chew a second time
